threads.title: - android goes back to `C:\Users\carlo\android` (or whatever...
threads.excerpt:
- android goes back to `C:\Users\carlo\android` (or whatever your new profile folder is called)
- The AppData folders go to `C:\Users\carlo\AppData\Roaming\[folder name]`

learnings.details:
vscode)
- Cricut Design Space
- ms-ad (not sure what this is?)
- pdf-filler-profiles

**Here's my recommended approach:**

**OPTION 1: Clean Migration (My recommendation)**
Better for a fresh start, less likely to have conflicts

**OPTION 2: Copy Everything Important**
Faster but might have issues

Which approach appeals to you more? And what's your priority - speed or clean setup?

**User:** The actual Knowledge Lake / mem0 MCP bridge is on my other device (the ARM64 Snapdragon laptop), so that's safe - these files were only partially set up on this laptop and not continued when I realised the new laptop would be better with its superior speed and storage capacity
